markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=1705)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Summon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=520" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 361 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aminara](/Deities.aspx?ID=664), [Arundhat](/Deities.aspx?ID=610), [Cyth-V’sug](/Deities.aspx?ID=428), [Furcas](/Deities.aspx?ID=526), [Granduncle Taproot](/Deities.aspx?ID=665), [Green Man](/Deities.aspx?ID=666), [Halcamora](/Deities.aspx?ID=120), [Halcamorra](/Deities.aspx?ID=647), [Telvrys](/Deities.aspx?ID=668), [Vermilion Mother](/Deities.aspx?ID=602), [Xhamen-Dor](/Deities.aspx?ID=578)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You summon a creature that has the [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) or [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=77) trait and whose level is –1 to fight for you.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** Level 1.

**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2.

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3.

**Heightened (5th)** Level 5.

**Heightened (6th)** Level 7.

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9.

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11.

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13.

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15.
name: Summon Plant or Fungus

</summary>
